edu.mills.cs180a.classfeedback

Class CommentActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • edu.mills.cs180a.classfeedback.CommentActivity

  • public class CommentActivity
extends Activity
    An Activity that solicits a Comment about the specified Person. The recipient of the comment is specified as an index into Person.everyone and is communicated via the key RECIPIENT in the android.intent.Intent.

    The user is given the choice of saving or canceling the comment. They can also clear the text field. If saved, it is added to the database, and the result code Activity#RESULT_OK is provided to the parent activity. Otherwise, the database is not modified, and the result code Activity#RESULT_CANCELED is provided.

    Author:
    ellen.spertus@gmail.com (Ellen Spertus), ctaymor@gmail.com (Caroline Taymor)
